description:
My place is close to Brooklyn Botanic Garden, Prospect park, Bunch-O-bagels, Subway station (3 & 4 trains) Located on Schenectady & Eastern Parkway &  A bus stop located on Troy Ave & Carroll Street. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the location, and the people. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Disclaimer: Our apartment sleeps five. There are two queen sized beds in the larger room & one twin sized in the smaller room. As well as two folding beds which will be provided if needed. looking forward to hosting you.
name: Cozy 2 Bedroom apt. in the heart of Brooklyn.
review: Mendy was very nice and helpful.
